K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-1: a'arya nanda garbh'a ba kr'anti nir de sha /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-3: 'phags pa dga' bo la mngal na gnas pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-7: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skya na shing n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun tshad med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-8: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i lus gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum cu dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-9: tshad bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung ba zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-10: de'i chung ma punda r'i ka zhes bya ba bzang mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-11: blta na sdug pa byad bzhin mdzes shing 'jig rten na dkon pa kha dog khyad par du 'phags shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:399b-12: mang po kun gyis lta bar 'dod pa zhig yod pas dga' bo de la chags shing zhen par gyur bas skad cig tsam du yang mi 'bral zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-0: 'dod pa'i sems kyis shin tu chags par @400a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-1: gyur te; srog gis 'jal bar byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen pas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe na bza' mnabs te lhung bzed bsnams nas zham 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-3: mthar gyis dga' bo'i khyim gang na bder gshegs nas de'i sgor gshegs te bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-4: de nas thugs rje chen po'i mthus 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu btang bas dga' bo'i khyim nang kun tu yang gser btso ma lta bu'i kha dog tu gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-5: de'i tshe dga' bo 'di snyam du 'od zer kun tu snang bar gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-8: snyam du bsam nas mi zhig mngags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-9: kye song la su yin pa ltos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-11: des kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong nas myur zhing rings pas slar log nas dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-13: des de skad ces smras pa thos nas myur du phyir phyung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-14: bcom ldan 'das bsus te phyag bya bar rnam pa las de'i tshe punda r'i ka 'di snyam du bdag gis gal te 'di btang bar gyur na; bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400a-15: snyam du bsam nas gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung ste ma btang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-0: deng re @400b zhig thong zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-1: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas bdag slar 'ong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-3: bdag cag dam bcas nas gdod de bzhin du gtang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-4: zhes de'i dpral bar thig le gsher ba'i mtshan ma btab nas 'di skad du thig le 'di ma bskams par slar gshegs su gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-5: gal te thogs par gyur na gser gyi karsha pa na lnga brgya'i chad pas gcad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-7: dga' bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-8: zhes sgor byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed blangs nas slar khyim du zhugs te bza' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-10: bca' ba bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang nas slar sgor byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-11: bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed ma len cig par mtshan ma bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po shin tu gzi byin che bas bzhes su gsol zhes gsol ba'i thugs kyang ma thub nas yang kun dga' bo la byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-15: khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di su las blangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-19: 'o na bcom ldan 'das la phul cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-21: bdag ston pa chen po la gsol ba'i thugs mi thub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:400b-22: zhes cang mi smra bar zham 'bring du song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-1: lag khang du gshegs nas phyag bcabs zhabs bsil te gdan la bzhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-2: dga' bos lhung bzed thogs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-4: khyod nga'i lhung bzed kyi lhag ma za'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la byin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-8: dga' bos gsol zin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-13: de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yab yum dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-16: bla ma'i gnas gzhan rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang nam yang 'gal bar ma mdzad pa'i phyir da ltar gang yang bka' las 'gal bar mi byed par mnyes par gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-18: khyod kyis dga' bo'i skra dang kha spu bregs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-21: zhes 'breg mkhan btsal nas de'i skra 'breg par brtsams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-22: dga' bos 'breg mkhan de la bsgo ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401a-23: kva ye khyod mi shes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-0: ring po mi thogs par stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur bas khyod kyis gal te nga'i skra @401b dang kha spu bregs par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-1: ngas khyod kyi lag pa gnyis 'khrig ma man chad gcad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-2: zhes bsdigs pas de shin tu skrag par gyur nas spu gri bsdus te phyir 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la de gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-5: dga' bo la ci khyod rab tu mi 'byung ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ril ba bsnams te de'i mgo bo la chu blugs nas 'breg mkhan gyis skra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-10: de 'di snyam du deng bdag re zhig bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu byas te rab tu 'byung mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-11: 'on kyang dgongs kar slar khyim du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-13: des dgongs kar lam du zhugs te song ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'gro ba'i lam du g-yang sa chen po zhig sbrul pa des mthong nas 'di snyam du punda r'i ka dang dus byas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-15: thag ring du gyur pas 'gro ba'i rkyen dang ldan par ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-16: deng bdag gis de bsam pa nyid kyis gal te 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur yang srid na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-17: gal te shi bar ma gyur na nam nangs te 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-18: zhes punda r'i ka dran pa'i mya ngan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-19: sdug bsngal gyis mtshan mo 'das par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:401b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-0: kun dga' bo khyod song la dga' bo de la khang skyong @402a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-2: des kyang de bzhin du de'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khang skyong byos shig par bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-4: des kyang khang skyong zhes bya ba ji lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-6: ci zhig byed ces dris so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-8: gtsug lag khang du dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag zhal ta bya dgos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-10: tshul ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-12: khang skyong zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-13: gal te dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la dong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-14: gtsug lag khang gi nang gi sa rnams phyags nas chag chag gdab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-15: ba lang gi lci ba gsar pa blangs nas go rim bzhin du 'jam por bsku bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-16: legs par yid la byas te srung zhing stor brlag med par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-17: gros su bya ba yod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-19: dri dang me tog yod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-21: mtshan mo sgo gcod cing nam nangs na dbye bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-23: chab khung sa rtag tu bkru zhing byi dor bya dgos so; ;gal te gtsug lag khang zhig cing ral pa yod na bcos legs bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-24: zhes de skad bstan pa thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402a-28: de nas dge slong rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-0: chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te grong khyer @402b ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la bzhud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-1: dga' bos gtsug lag khang na su yang med par mthong nas bdag gis phyag dar byas zin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-3: zhes phyag dar byed pa la zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs shing mkhyen pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phyags zin pa'i sa gtsang ma rnams slar phyag dar gyis gang bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-5: des kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis phyag dar bor te slar khyim du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-6: snyam du bsam nas des phyags ma slar bsdus nas phyag dar bor bar brtsams pa dang zad par ma gyur nas des bsam pa gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad de 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-7: snyam nas des gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad par brtsams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo gcig bcad zin nas sgo gzhan bcad tsam na sgo gzhan yang bye bar byin gyis brlabs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-9: de nyon mongs pa skyes nas gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te rkun pos gtsug lag khang 'di nyams par byas kyang 'di la gnod pa ci yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-10: bdag rgyal por gyur pa na 'di bas ches lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang bzang po brgya stong rtsig par zad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-12: slar khyim du 'gro ba'i rigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-13: zhes gal te lam po cher zhugs nas 'gro na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-14: bcom ldan 'das dang phrad du dogs pas gseb lam du zhugs te 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:402b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas gseb lam de nyid du zhugs te gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-1: nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas mi 'phrad par bya ba'i phyir lam gyi 'gram na ljon shing yal ga dang grib mar ldan pa thur du 'jol ba zhig gi drung du gab ste 'dug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis ljon shing de'i yal ga gyen du brdzes nas de'i lus mngon du snang bar byin gyis brlabs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-6: nga'i phyi bzhin du shog cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-8: de yang skyengs te ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du 'di chung ma la chags shing zhen par gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-10: 'di de dang dbral zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir grong khyer ser skya nas byung ste grong khyer mnyan yod du gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-11: snyam du dgongs nas der byon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-12: ri dvags dgra'i ma sa ga'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dga' bo blun po 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-14: rtag tu chung ma la chags shing zhen nas gtong bar mi byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-15: 'di la thabs shig sbyar te sems nye bar zhi bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-17: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-18: khyod kyis sngon chad dri ldan zhes bya ba'i ri mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-21: gal te de ltar na nga'i chos gos kyi gra nas zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403a-22: des kyang na bza'i gra nas bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-0: de nas bcom 'das @403b dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du nam mkha' la lding ste ri dri ldan du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs cig tu g-yas g-yon du gzigs pa las shing drung zhig na spra mo mig ya gcig zhar ba zhig gdong btegs nas mi g-yo bar rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la bltas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-2: khyod kyis spra mo zhar ma 'di mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-8: spra mo zhar ma 'di pund'a r'i ka dang bsgrun na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-9: gang bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-13: lha'i bu mo 'dra bar byad bzhin mchog tu gyur cing 'jig rten na zla ma mchis pa lags pas spra mo 'di dang bsgrun par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-14: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-22: rgyur yang mi bzod lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-24: khyod kyis lha'i gzhal med khang mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-27: 'o na yang chos gos kyi gra nas zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-28: des kyang na bza' nas bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:403b-29: ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas su gshegs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-0: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la khyod song la lha'i gzhal med khang khyad par du 'phags @404a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-1: pa'i gnas rnams la ltos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang dga' ba'i tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-4: shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-8: chos bzang khang la sogs pa lha rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-13: rtsed mo rtse zhing dga' mgu'i gnas su song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-14: kun tu khyab par bltas nas mthar gyis grong khyer blta na sdug tu zhugs pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-17: rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra snyan pa la sogs pa 'byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-18: gnas de dang de dag tu lha'i bu mo dang bu pho shin tu mdzes pa dag lhan cig rtse zhing 'khod pa dag mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-19: dga' bos kun tu brtags pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-20: gnas gzhan zhig gi gzhal med khang na lha'i bu mo 'ba' zhig yod kyi lha'i bu pho med par mthong nas lha'i bu mo de dag la ci'i rgyus gnas gzhan na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-22: lha'i bu pho 'dres par gnas nas bde ba rnams myong bar byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-24: gang gi phyir lha'i bu mo 'ba' zhig lhan cig gnas shing lha'i bu mo snang bar gyur ces dris pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404a-25: lha'i bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-0: de dus las @404b 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar 'gyur pas bdag cag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-1: 'dir de la sdod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-3: dga' bos de skad thos nas dga' mgu rangs pas myur zhing rangs par bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-5: khyod kyis lha rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i dngos po dag mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyis dngos po ci zhig mthong zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-9: des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-12: khyod kyis lha'i bu mo rnams mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:404b-15: lha'i bu mo de dag pund'a r'i ka dang bsgrun na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:410a-3: gzhan yang bar ma do'i srid pa de ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe sems phyin ci log tu gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:410a-24: khang pa brtsegs ma'i steng du 'dzeg go /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:410b-13: skye ba len pa de ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430a-6: snyam du khyod kyis so sor brtag par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430a-7: ji tsam du bza' ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430a-23: khron pa mnam po dang 'dra bar rtag tu lan tshva dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-7: gzhan yang sems can bsod nams chung ba kha cig ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-8: ma'i mngal na 'phred du nyal ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-10: de yang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyi phyir ram /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-11: yang na mas kha zas ma snyoms pa shin tu grang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-15: shin tu kha ba zos pa'i phyir ram /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-16: yang na tshad las 'das par skom 'thungs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-18: nad bu can du gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-19: mya ngan mang pos non tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-21: brdegs par gyur na yang rkyen 'di dag gi dbang gis ma'i lus kyang yongs su gdung bar 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:430b-22: ma'i lus yongs su gdungs par gyur pa'i phyir mngal na gnas pa yang yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro; ;yongs su gdungs par gyur pa'i phyir na sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431a-1: log par 'phred du nyal zhing 'byung bar mi nus pa la bud med mkhas pas mar ram /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431a-9: de'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa yang de dang 'dra ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431a-14: gzhan yang btsas su nye ba'i tshe na sdug bsngal dang bcas bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431a-15: las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lag pa bsnol nas yan lag dang nying lag bcum ste sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa myong nas ma'i mngal nas byung bar gyur bas lus kyi yan lag thams cad sngon por 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-0: gsar du skrangs pa la reg par mi @431b bzod pa bzhin du bkres skom gyis gdungs pa dang snying 'phyang zhing gdung ba dang bcas bzhin du las kyi rlung gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis bus nas mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-1: mngal nas byung nas kyang phyi rol gyi rlung gis reg par gyur pa na 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-3: mtshon gyis bcad nas thal bas bskus pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-4: lag pa dang gos kyis reg par gyur ba'i tshe na yang thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-5: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang dbang po rab tu rno ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas rnam par g-yeng bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-6: ma'i mngal du shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-8: 'byung ba thams cad kyang sdug bsngal ba yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-10: mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-12: de la su zhig ma'i mngal du yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-13: yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-15: ji ltar 'di na so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-16: rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims srung ba la dga' zhing yang dang yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:431b-18: de'i sems drang zhing bag med par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-0: shes rab chung ngu dang ldan pas 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par 'gyur pa rgyun du zhugs @432a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-1: pa skye ba lan bdun pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-2: rigs nas rigs su skye ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-4: bar chad gcig pa dag yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-5: gang zag de dag gis sngar dge ba spyad pas 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang sems la g-yeng ba med par yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-6: thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-7: zhes bya ba nas ma'i mngal nas byung nas zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-8: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub pa rnams myong bar gyur kyang dbang po 'bring dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-9: mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed ces bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-11: su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug la yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing 'byung bar byed ce na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-13: 'di ltar 'di na so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432a-14: rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims srung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-0: rtag tu dngos po mchog la mos shing bsod nams mngon par 'du byed @432b pa zhes bya ba nas 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par gyur pa rgyun du zhugs pa skye ba lan bdun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-1: 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang sems la g-yeng ba med par yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-2: dbang po rnon po ma yin pa'i phyir shes bzhin du mngal du 'jug par byed kyang mi shes bzhin du gnas shing 'byung bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-3: mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-5: su zhig yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-8: ji ltar 'di na so so skye bo'i sems can kha cig tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 'bral ba la dga' zhing dge ba'i phyogs sgrub par mi byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-9: rtag tu dngos po ngan pa la mos shing sdig pa rnams spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-10: sems kyi rang bzhin mi drang zhing bag med pa mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-11: shes rab dang mi ldan pa dag longs spyod la mngon par zhen cing ser sna byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-12: rtag tu lag pa bskums nas gzhan dag la rkyong zhing gtong bar mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:432b-13: rtag tu re ba dang bcas shing sems rab tu dul bar ma gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-0: la ba dang spyod pa phyin ci log tu gyur bas 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa dang bcas shing sdig pa mi dge ba'i las @433a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-2: 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-5: yid du mi 'ong ba dag gis rab tu gzir zhing de'i sems rnam par g-yeng bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi dbang gis bdag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-8: da gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes rab tu mi shes pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-11: dus gsum du yang dag par shes bzhin med pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-12: rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-14: sems can de dag mir skyes nas de lta bu'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-16: gnas mchog tu gyur pa yin pas bskal ba bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du yang mi'i lus shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-17: gal te mtho ris su skyes par gyur na yang rtag tu ltung bas 'jigs pas sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-18: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha gzhan rnams kyi 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-19: khyod bde 'gro'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-26: shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-27: khom pa dang ldan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-28: de bas kyang ches shin tu rnyed par dga' ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-31: ngan song gsum po dag gang yin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433a-32: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-0: rtag @433b tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-1: rab tu tsha zhing rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyur bas dpe byar yang mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-3: rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-4: rab tu mnyen cing dul ba'i sems med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-6: gsod cing gnod par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-7: lag pa khrag gis bskus pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-8: byams pa dang snying rje med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-11: gal te mi dang nye bar 'gyur na yang bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-12: rtag par sgrib pa dang bcas shing thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-13: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-14: tshad med dpag tu med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-15: don gyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-16: bsod nams kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-17: chos kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-18: dge ba'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-19: drang po'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-20: phan tshun gcig la gcig za ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-21: mthu dang ldan pa rnams mthu chung ba dag la za bar byed pa dag yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-22: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kha cig ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-25: mun par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-26: mi gtsang ba'i gnas gcin skyag gi nang du gnas nas res 'ga' snang ba dang bcas pa yang yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-31: tre la ta lta bu rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-32: gzhan yang rtag par mun pa'i nang du skyes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:433b-33: mun pa'i nang du rgas par gyur pa tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-1: rabs snga ma la mir gyur pa na glen zhing gti mug bas chos yang dag par ma mnyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-4: yid thal rangs su gtong zhing 'dod pa lnga la mngon par zhen par gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-5: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas pas de'i rigs su skyes nas glen zhing rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dag yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-6: dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can chu'i nang du skyes nas chu'i nang du rgas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-7: chu'i nang du dus byed par 'gyur ba tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-13: ba lu ka lta bu rnams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-14: thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma la lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-16: yid kyi las mi dge ba'i dbang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-18: gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can bshang ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-20: btung bar byed pa tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434a-32: thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-0: gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas @434b pa rtag tu rtsa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-2: mi gtsang ba'i dngos po rnams za zhing 'thung bar byed tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-9: dre'u la sogs pa lta bu rnams te de dag thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i las mi dge ba'i dbang gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-11: kye ma kyi hud srid pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-15: shin tu mchog tu 'bar ba yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-16: sems can 'ga' tsam yang des ma bsregs shing ma btsos pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-22: yid kyi me rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pas mngon du snang ba'i yul gzugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-27: chos yongs su gnyer ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-30: rab tu 'bar bar byed pa'i me gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-43: 'khrug pa'i me dag gis rtag tu bsregs shing 'bar bar byed pas 'ga' tsam yang de las thar pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:434b-45: le lo la rab tu gnas pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-0: sdug bsngal mang po myong zhing @435a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-1: nyon mongs pas kun tu dkris nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byas pas 'khor bar 'khor yang nye bar zhi zhing rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-2: brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-3: bde ba mang du myos zhing brtul ba'i sems skyed par byed pas nyon mongs pa yongs su bsal nas dge ba'i chos sgom pa'i rab tu brtson pa mi gtong ba la rgyun 'chad pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-5: deng khyod kyi lus 'di'i pags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-12: ring por mi thogs par gyes shing 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-13: snyam du so sor brtags nas rtag par sems rtse gcig tu le lo mi byed par mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-16: 'jig rten pa rnams dang rtsod par mi byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:435a-18: nan gyis nga dang rtsod par byed do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-4: 'di dag kun la rtsa yod pas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-6: rtsib logs g-yas pa'i rus pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-7: phan tshun 'brel ba bcu gsum yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-8: rtsib logs g-yon 'brel skye ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-9: rus pa dag ni bcu gsum yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-10: rus pa'i lu gu rgyud 'di dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-11: gsum gsum dag ni phan tshun 'brel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-12: gnyis gnyis dag ni tshigs ldan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-13: lhag ma gzhan ni 'brel pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-14: g-yas g-yon brla ni gnyis po la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-15: bsdus na rus pa lnga bcu yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-16: lus dang 'brel ba'i rus pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-17: bsdoms na sum brgya drug cu yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-18: rus tshigs phan tshun 'brel na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-19: sems can lus ni grub yin zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-20: yang dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-21: bden tshig tu ni gsungs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-22: rkang mthil nas ni mgo bo'i bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-23: mi gtsang 'dres shing mi brtan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-24: de dag lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-26: rus pa 'ba' zhig gzer bu med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-27: sha khrag kun tu bskus pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-29: sgyu ma'i sprul ba'i gzugs brnyan 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-30: lus 'di rtsa rgyus dkris nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-31: pags pa gsher bas g-yogs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-32: gnas dgu rma yi sgo yod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-33: de lta bur ni blta bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-34: kun nas gcin skyag mi gtsang bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440a-35: rtag tu gang zhing 'dzag pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-0: dper na bang pa dong @440b rnams su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-1: 'bru rnams sna tshogs gang ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-2: lus 'di yang ni de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-3: mi gtsang sna tshogs rab tu gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-5: nyam chung snying po ci yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-6: byis pa skye bo rtag tu chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-7: mkhas pa dag ni zhen mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-8: mchil snabs rdul ni rtag tu 'bab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-9: rnag khrag dag ni rgyun du gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-11: klad rgyas dag ni klad pas gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-12: snying khar bad kan rgyun du 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-13: nang gi zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-14: klad rgyas dang ni pags pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-15: snying dang nang grol glo mchin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-16: 'di la sogs pa'i rus myags dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-17: mi gtsang rnams dang lhan cig gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-18: sdig pa'i lus ni 'jigs rung bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-19: 'di nyid bdag gi dgra yin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-20: shes med 'dod la zhen pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-21: blun po rtag tu phangs par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-23: grong khyer rnying pa 'dra bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-24: nyin mtshan nyon mongs rab gzir cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-25: skad gcig mi gnas kun tu 'khyams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-26: rus pa'i grong khyer rtsig par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-27: sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal bskus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-28: 'dod sdang gti mug mtshon bkye nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-29: ci rigs par ni rgyan par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-30: rus pa'i grong khyer skyug bro ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-32: rtag tu sdug pa'i grogs po yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-33: phyi nang sdug bsngal gdung bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-36: ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-37: nyin mtshan rtag tu dran byos la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:440b-38: 'dod pa'i yul la sems ma byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-2: rnam grol yongs su tshol bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-5: dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-6: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-7: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te mthar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su phyin nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pas bdag nyid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-8: gus sems khrus ni bstab pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-9: tshu gtsang byug spos phul ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-10: bsod nams rnams ni bsgrubs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-11: rnam smin mchog 'di thob pa yin; ;de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces smras pa thos pas thams cad the tshom skyes par gyur nas the tshom gcod pa'i phyir ston pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-13: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'dis sngon sug las ci bgyis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-14: de'i rnam par smin pas lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441a-15: mtshan sum cu dang ldan pas bdag nyid brgyan cing bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bas sor bzhis thung bar gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-0: ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen pa las ston pa chen pos thugs brtse bar dgongs nas mthus 'khor ba'i rgya @441b mtsho las bsgral te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-1: thabs kyis shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par bzhag pa bkas bshad du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-4: dge slong dga' bos sngon las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su smin pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-5: thams cad mngon du gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-6: zhes gzhan las bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-7: gal te bskal pa brgya lon kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-8: las byas chud zar mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-9: rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-10: lus can nyid la 'bras bur smin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-13: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na skye rgu rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-16: bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-17: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:441b-18: dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer gnyen ldan rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du gshegs nas mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-0: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i g-yas khyim gyi gcung zhig yod pa de 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa @442a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-1: las; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar bskul nas thabs kyis mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rnam par bzhag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-2: de'i tshe na yul de'i bdag po mnyen ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-3: 'di ltar rgyal po chos kyis mi rnams 'dul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-4: mi dang skye bo mang po rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-6: g-yo sgyu dang chom rkun med cing nad dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-10: bu ram shing kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-11: rgyal po de'i g-yas khyim gyi nu bo zhig yod pa yang shin tu 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-12: rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs par thos pas btsun mo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-15: skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi gtam kun tu bstan cing gzengs bstod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-17: khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442a-18: de'i nu bo 'dod pa la zhen cing khyim nas 'byung du ma btub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-0: de'i tshe de la blon po'i bu @442b dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-1: gzhan yang snga nas lhan cig rtse rtse ba'i grogs po dag gis kye grogs po shes par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-2: 'di ltar rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-5: skye bo mang po dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ste gus pas dam pa'i chos mnyan pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-6: 'di ltar khyod kyang mi lus shin tu thob par dka' ba las deng thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-7: ci'i phyir 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags nas sgor yang 'byung du mi btub ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-8: des kyang de skad du spyo pa thos pas shin tu ngo che bar gyur nas de dag gis rjes su 'brangs te lhan cig dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i gcung dge slong des mang po de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te dong ba mthong nas kye khyod ci'i phyir mi 'di gcig pu khrid nas lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro zhes dris pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-10: de dag gis kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-14: sngon khyim na gnas pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i yul rnams la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-15: ston pa chen pos thugs rjer dgongs nas mthus 'khor ba las bzlas te mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:442b-16: gzhan yang skyes bu glen pa bdag dang 'dra ba 'di lta bu yod pa las khyed kyis snying brtse nas lhan cig khrid de 'ongs pa shin tu legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-1: pa'i ston pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der khrid cig dang gdon mi za bar shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-3: de dag kyang lhan cig 'grogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag la gzigs nas dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-5: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos yang dag par bstan pas de dag gis thos par gyur nas shin tu dad pa skyes pas 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-6: bcom ldan 'das ston pa chen po 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par bsro khang du khrus la gshegs par ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyang cang mi gsung bar gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-8: des kyang zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443a-9: de nas rgyal po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang rgyal po la lus gus pas phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-0: bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis nas chos thos pa dang shin tu dad pa bskyed de 'dod pa'i yul rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par bsro khang du khrus la gshegs par gsol ba las de bzhin gshegs @443b pa ston pa chen pos kyang thugs brtse bar dgongs nas gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-2: lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-3: lhas kyang grong khyer gyi shul dang srang rnams phyag dar byas nas chag chag btab ste mdzes par bgyi ba'i rigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-5: rgyal pos 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs na; bdag gis grong khyer mdzes par bya mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-6: 'on kyang bdag gis nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen nas bzlog par dka' ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-7: deng bcom ldan 'das kyis thul bar gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-8: yang dag par ngo mtshar che'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-9: snyam du bsam nas nu bo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-11: khyod song la khrus kyi yo byad ci dgos pa sbyor cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-12: ngas kyang ci nus kyis grong khyer brgyan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-14: rgyal po'i nu bo yang shin tu dga' bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-15: rgyal po la phyag byas nas langs te song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-16: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-17: kye khyed cag deng la grong khyer du dril chen po bsgrags te phyogs su 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-18: sang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-19: grong khyer na gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-20: yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo rnams so so nas ci nus kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la lam dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:443b-21: srang rnams phyag dar byas te chag chag btab nas me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-0: dri rnams thogs te ston pa chen po gshegs pa su zhig @444a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-2: blon po rnams kyis kyang lha /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-4: zhes rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas phyogs su go bar bsgo zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-5: dril chen gyi sgra bsgrags pas skye bo rnams grong khyer de'i rdo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-7: bong ba rnams bsal te sa spos kyi chus kun tu khyab par chag chag btab nas bdug pa dam pa rnams kyang bsregs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-10: ba dan mang po yang btsugs te me tog rnams mngon par gtor bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi skyed mos tshal dga' ba bzhin du byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-11: de'i tshe rgyal po'i nu bos kyang spos chu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-12: spos mar la sogs pa sbyar te bsro khang mdzes par byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-13: khri bshams nas gdan yang bting ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs mthar gyis grong khyer du gshegs su nye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-20: skye bo mang po rnams grong nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa bsus nas rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te zham 'bring byas nas grong khyer du gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-21: de'i tshe rgyal po'i nu bo des kyang bcom ldan 'das bsro khang du gshegs par spyan drangs te spos chu la sogs pa phul nas sku bsil par gsol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yongs su brgyan pa mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-0: @444b rab tu dga' nas shin tu dang ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-1: sku bsil nas na bza' mnabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-2: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas 'di skad du deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa la mchod pa cung zad bgyis pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang tha dad pa med pa'i gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-4: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gcung 'di 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las mthus yongs su bzlas te shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar gyur pa de bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur nas gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-5: 'di ltar bdag 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur na yang mthus sred pa'i chu bo zab mo las yongs su bzlas te mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gzhol bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-8: khyed kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mnyen ldan gyi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:444b-11: dge slong dga' bo 'di nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-0: 'dis sngon 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs bsro khang du gshegs par gsol nas spos chu la sogs pas sku bsil te shin tu dang ba'i dad pas smon lam btab pa de'i dge @445a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-1: ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur nas lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-2: 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las ngas mthus phyung ste khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu bde ba'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-3: de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du gyur nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu mngon par grub pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-8: 'dis las mngon par 'dus byas pas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher snga ma bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-9: sngon 'das pa'i dus su ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-10: yo byad kyis brel pa med pa zhig gnas pa de la skyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras bu rgyas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-13: ljon shing dang ldan pa rab tu byung ba'i dben gnas su 'os pa zhig yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445a-14: de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten du byung nas dben pa na gnas pa yod pas; nam 'jig rten du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i tshe 'di 'ba' zhig bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-0: de nas rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing ri brag gi grong khyer der phyin @445b nas phan tshun kun tu brtags te gnas btsal ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-1: de'i skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-2: skyed mos tshal de srung ba'i mis 'phags pa de mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-3: bde bar gshegs pa mnyel bso ba'i slad du 'phags pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol zhes smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-4: des nam gyi gung thun la me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-5: skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis mthong nas 'di snyam du btsun pa chen po 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-6: 'di lta bu'i spyod pa mchog grub pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-7: snyam du bsam nas de nas nub mo langs te khyim bdag ga la ba der song nas 'di skad du khyim bdag chen po /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-8: deng dga' ba chen po skyed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-9: skyed mos tshal na 'phags pa zhig bdag gi thad du gshegs nas mtshan mo 'das pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-11: spyod pa gya nom pa dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-12: rdzu 'phrul chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas 'od zer chen po bkye nas skyed mos tshal gyi nang kun tu gsal bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-13: zhes smras pa khyim bdag gis thos nas myur zhing rings par skyed mos tshal du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-15: bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-18: thugs brtse bar dgongs te skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs su gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:445b-19: bdag gis rtog par bsod snyoms sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-0: des kyang de gus pas gsol ba btab par mthong nas khas blangs te skyed mos tshal de'i nang du gnas nas bsam gtan dang rnam par @446a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-1: thar pa mchog la snyoms par zhugs te bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-2: dus gzhan zhig na 'di snyam du bdag gi lus rus pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-3: 'khor bar 'khor ba las bdag gis gang bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-5: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs nas gtan du mi skye ba mngon sum du bya ba'i rigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-6: snyam nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul rnams mngon par bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-7: 'od zer chen po bkye nas steng du 'bar ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-9: 'og tu chu 'bab pa la sogs pa bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-10: lus 'di spangs nas rnam par shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur ba lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-11: de nas khyim bdag des de'i rus bu blangs nas dri'i shing thams cad kyis bsregs te 'o mas me bsad nas rus pa lhag ma ma lus par bsdus te bum pa gsar pa'i nang du bcug nas mchod rten brtsigs te gdugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-13: ba dan rnams btsugs nas shin tu dang ba'i dad pas dri'i chu gya nom pa sum cu gtor te mtshan bzang po rnams grub par shog cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-16: legs par nyon la de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446a-20: 'dis mchod pa mchog byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-0: shin tu dang ba bskyed pa'i las kyi dbang gis deng 'dir mtshan mchog khyad par du 'phags pa sum cu mngon @446b bar grub pa rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-1: de nas 'khor mang po rnams yang the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-3: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos las ci bgyis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-4: gal te 'di rab tu ma byung zhing khyim na gnas par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-5: gdon mi za bar stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dis bgyid par 'gyur ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-8: dga' bos tshe rabs snga ma la las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su smin par gyur pa'i tshe gdon mi za bar bdag nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-11: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu rnams tshe lo stong phrag nyi shu thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba mtshan sum cu dang ldan pa 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-12: yul w'a ra n'a si dang srong lhung ba'i gnas ri dvags byin pa'i tshal na bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-13: de'i tshe grong khyer de na rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-14: 'di ltar chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul bar byed pas chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:446b-16: rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan @447a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-2: rgyal po des gus pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung blangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-5: lha'i spos kyi shing la sogs pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-6: bsregs te 'o mas me bsad nas ring bsrel bsdus te rin po che'i bum pa'i nang du bcug nas mchod rten chen po rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-7: khor ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-9: dpag tshad phyed yod pa brtsigs nas de la 'khor lo 'dzugs pa'i tshe rgyal po'i bu 'bring po des bdag nyid steng du 'dzegs nas 'khor lo bar ma btsugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu 'bring por gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-14: 'dis sngon 'das pa'i dus su gus pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-15: 'khor lo bar ma btsugs pa'i dge ba'i las des tshe rabs nyis stong lnga brgya'i bar du rtag par gling gcig la dbang ba'i stobs kyis 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-16: tshe 'di la gal te rab tu byung bar ma gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-17: de bzhin du stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la dbang sgyur ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-18: de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du gyur nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-20: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447a-21: nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bka' stsal lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-0: bcom ldan @447b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-2: smon lam gyi stobs las gyur pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-4: dga' bo 'di sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-5: de'i mkhan po bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-6: des ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang tshe de nyid la mngon par rtogs pa ci yang thob par ma gyur pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-7: des 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di skad du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang tshe 'di nyid la mngon par rtogs pa ci yang med pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-8: bdag gis 'dir tshangs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-9: mchan yang sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:447b-11: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa rnams spangs nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-0: ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan @448a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-1: 'das de'i bstan pa la dbang po'i sgo sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-2: ces smon lam btab pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-3: smon lam de'i stobs kyis deng 'dir nga'i bstan pa la nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-5: gang gcig tu nag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-6: gang gcig tu dkar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-7: las 'dren ma gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-8: rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma myong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-10: khyed stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-11: mngal na gnas pa bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-037-003:448a-12: 'dus pa bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so ////
